column2:
"Excellent, excellent. I'd say you've got the
basics down."

"This boot camp is now complete. It's been
quite some time since anyone's finished
the third one."

"But, this is just the beginning.
If you want to get more special
training, come see me again."

"はい、よろしい。
基礎総括としては十分なレベルね。"

"それでは、これにて本特訓は完了。
第三段階まで来た人は久しぶりね。"

"でも、これはまだ始まり。
さらなる特訓が受けたかったら
また私の元に来なさい。"
